title: The Black Wolf's Mark III
description: Zidane arrives at the Tiger Head village, in that place he finally meets his worst enemy.The man that separated him from his biological family and he is also the main commanding of his death, when he was still a newborn.In this village is a female dancer that dances with a serpent and she attracts crowds of people to her.And Zidane will take by surprise at this woman that enchants one hundred of men with her enchantments.Will he find Amarilis again?Will the black wolf win his worst enemy and resist to more catastrophes into his life?[image]
author: Pet Torres
